full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/17/2023 FOIA (b)(6) October 27, 2008 Bureau of Immigration and Citizenship Services U.S. Department of Homeland Security Vermont Service Center 75 Lower Welden Street St. Albans, VT 05479-0001 RE: FOIA (b) (6) CHARLESTON, Charlesia, Mother, File #: EAC0835912253 (I130) Case Type: Two I-130 petition (Follow up) Dear Sir or Madam: Thank you very much for your recent notice dated October 14, 2008, requesting for additional document for my mother I-130 petition. Please find the following information and documents that you have requested: 1. A copy of my Certificate of Presentations to the Temple (Baptismal Certificates) with an English Translation. 2. A copy of my U.S. Marriage Certificate with FOIA (b)(6) FOIA (b)(6) showing my maiden name is FOIA (b)(6) but my married name is FOIA (b)(6) 3. Your original notice. Please contact me immediately if any further information is required, and I look forward to hearing from you. Sincerely, FOIA (b)(6) Petitioner Enclosures
